Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute near Dorchester/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses temp. rerouted EB: 63rd, Kimbark, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd; WB: 63rd, 64th, Kenwood & 63rd due to, street blockage near Dorchester/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Dorchester/Woodlawn.

Eastbound buses will operate via 63rd, Kimbark, 64th, Blackstone and 63rd.

Westbound buses will operate via 63rd, 64th, Kenwood and 63rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at South Chicago/Oglesby
ShortDescription: 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 86th, Anthony and 87th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Oglesby.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via South Chicago, 86th, Anthony and 87th: due to, street blockage near South Chicago/Oglesby.

Allow extra travel time.
